Question.Subject: What's the best way of selling my music on the internet?
Question.Content:
I'm not interested in letting Apple take a large share of money from my hard work. If my myspace, facebook and twitter pages are the hub of peoples' knowledge of my music is there anyway I can set up my own Paypal link for them to purchase the mp3s from a private server or somewhere else without losing a considerable deal of the money?
I know it seems greedy but I think Apple and many other sellers are worse for their percentage takings.

Answer.Reference: Lady Gaga- Her music sucks, but its just her fashion and the way she looks that's gotten her famous. (As well as the whole hermaphrodite conspiracy about her...) As well as many other artists.
